General.Name: RDC Semiconductor Co Ltd
General.Description: RDC Semiconductor Co., Ltd. designs and develops IC for high-end and low power bit microprocessors in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers Emkore DE and Emkore DS processor platforms for embedded commercial applications, such as digital electronic signage, automatic teller machines, smart vending machines, human-machine interfaces, thin computers, and terminal sales systems; and RDC IAD processor platform for mobile networking applications in consumer electronics, and embedded markets. It also provides RDC 32-bit microcontrollers for various applications, including industrial control, automation, NAT routers, home gateway and access points, industrial PCs, thin client applications, and others; RDC16-bit microcontrollers for general embedded market applications, such as industrial controls, control automation, terminals, signal generators, and projectors; and RDC NPU for equipment manufacturers. In addition, the company offers RDC ASIC that provides clients with complete services and industrial application solutions; low power processors for programmable automation controller, embedded board solutions, data concentrator, and industrial automation control system applications; and multi-function peripheral controllers and PCI express/PCI interfaces. Further, it provides 8-bit MCU IP that is used for DSC, CF card, pattern recognition, LCD monitor controller, USB device controller, scanner controller, MP3 controller, modem controller, and voice recognition applications. RDC Semiconductor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
